title: Fréchet–Urysohn space
summary: In the field of topology, a Fréchet–Urysohn space is a topological space X {\displaystyle X} with the property that for every subset S ⊆ X {\displaystyle S\subseteq X} the closure of S {\displaystyle S} in X {\displaystyle X} is identical to the sequential closure of S {\displaystyle S} in X . {\displaystyle X.} Fréchet–Urysohn spaces are a special type of sequential space.
